{"name": "Crossroads United Methodist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "New clients must bring:
Their photo ID
A piece of ID for each person in the household (such as an insurance card or Social Security car)
A utility bill showing the home address.
30 people will be served at a time.", "email": "", "url": "https://crossroadsumccolumbus.org/food-pantry", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1100 South Hague Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Hilltop", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43204", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9321953, "longitude": -83.0751508}, "phones": [{"number": "(614) 272-8242", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "20:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Photo ID and proof of address is required for adults 18+"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required for all members of the household"}]}
